member.name: M:SB3Utility.Plugins.ExportMqo(SB3Utility.xxParser,System.Object[],System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exports the specified meshes to Metasequoia format.
member.param: [DefaultVar] The xxParser.
(string[]) The names of the meshes to export.
The destination directory.
True will export all meshes in a single file. False will export a file per mesh.
True will transform vertices into world coordinates by multiplying them by their parent frames. False will keep their local coordinates.
exports meshes sorted in alphabetic order

member.name: M:SB3Utility.Plugins.OpenPP(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a .pp archive file from the specified path.
member.param: [DefaultVar] Path of the file.
member.returns: A ppParser that represents the .pp archive.

member.returns: A ppParser that represents the .pp archive.

member.summary: Extracts a subfile with the specified name and writes it to the specified path.

member.name: M:COLLADA.Conditioner.ConvexTriangulator(COLLADA.Document)
member.summary:
This method will convert convex polygons to triangles
A more advanced condionner would be required to handle convex, complex polygons

member.summary: This is a base class shared by a lot of elements. It contains the id, name and asset information that is contained by many COLLADA elements

member.summary: Locator is used to store all the URI values one can find in a COLLADA document
